categories: Category:TOR dates usages without act argument

nodes.text: The Devaronian Kandhar led a faction of the White Maw pirate group during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Kandhar sought to take over the White Maw, and allied with the Empire. However, a Republic smuggler exposed to his men that the deal would rob them of their independence from the Empire, leading them to mutiny and flee Hoth.
